page.component.dropdown.text-1: Dropdown with an array of strings or numbers
page.component.dropdown.text-2: Dropdown with an array of objects
page.component.dropdown.text-3: Dropdown with groups of array of objects
page.component.dropdown.doc.prop.icon: Class name of the icon to prepend
page.component.dropdown.doc.prop.items: Array of values that composes the list
page.component.dropdown.doc.prop.v-model: Binds the model changes of dropdown
page.component.dropdown.doc.slot.group-i: Slot to custom each items group of the list
page.component.dropdown.doc.slot.keyword: Slot containing the input text with keyword
page.component.dropdown.doc.slot.item: Slot to custom each item of the list
page.component.dropdown.doc.slot.placeho: Placeholder slot for the default list title element
